verses.verse: A Song <S%H7892><s%> of degrees <S%H4609><s%>. They that trust <S%H982><s%> in the LORD <S%H3068><s%> shall be as mount <S%H2022><s%> Zion <S%H6726><s%>, which cannot be removed <S%H4131><s%>, but abideth <S%H3427><s%> for ever <S%H5769><s%>.

As the mountains <S%H2022><s%> are round about <S%H5439><s%> Jerusalem <S%H3389><s%>, so the LORD <S%H3068><s%> is round about <S%H5439><s%> his people <S%H5971><s%> from henceforth even for <S%H5704><s%> ever <S%H5769><s%>.

For the rod <S%H7626><s%> of the wicked <S%H7562><s%> shall not rest <S%H5117><s%> upon the lot <S%H1486><s%> of the righteous <S%H6662><s%>; lest <S%H4616><s%> the righteous <S%H6662><s%> put forth <S%H7971><s%> their hands <S%H3027><s%> unto iniquity <S%H5766><s%>. the wicked: Heb. wickedness
Do good <S%H2895><s%>, O LORD <S%H3068><s%>, unto those that be good <S%H2896><s%>, and to them that are upright <S%H3477><s%> in their hearts <S%H3826><s%>.

As for such as turn aside <S%H5186><s%> unto their crooked ways <S%H6128><s%>, the LORD <S%H3068><s%> shall lead them forth <S%H3212><s%> with the workers <S%H6466><s%> of iniquity <S%H205><s%>: but peace <S%H7965><s%> shall be upon Israel <S%H3478><s%>.
